messages.subject: New to watch, hear, read, at SandraDodd.com
messages.msgSnippet: There are several new things on my site in the past week.  Some are not new-new, but before now they cost money or weren’t available. Also, each post on my
messages.messageBody:
There are several new things on my site in the past week. Some are not new-new, but before now they cost money or weren’t available.
Also, each post on my site-updates blog has an image from Just Add Light that I especially liked, from recent days. Each of those is a link to the blog post on which it first appeared. So the “About Unschooling” blog has become a sort of gallery of some of the more striking photos from Just Add Light and Stir.

Sweet feedback, getting it, labels (small bits of writing added to existing pages)
https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/03/sweet-feedback-getting-it-labels.html

Video Interview of Sandra and Kirby Dodd, 2010, for Class Dismissed film
https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/03/2010-video-interview-of-kirby-and.html
I’m working on a transcript but it’s not finished yet. The first part’s in. When it’s finished it will be at:
http://sandradodd.com/classDismissed

Two sound files with notes, and one one new page on happiness:
https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/03/happiness-and-word-radical.html

Two sound files (conference presentations) with lots of notes and links:
https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/03/partnerships-and-screwing-it-up.html

Those all have download options, so if you do a lot of driving, there’s over four hours of something to listen to.

Sanda
